mapper.insert: insert into message_save(chat_message_no, company_member_no, reg_datetime) VALUES (#{chat_message_no}, #{company_member_no}, now())
mapper.delete: delete from message_save WHERE chat_message_no = #{chat_message_no} AND company_member_no = (select no from company_member WHERE user_no = #{user_no})
mapper.select: select * from chat_message WHERE no in (select chat_message_no from message_save WHERE message_save.company_member_no = (select no from company_member WHERE user_no = #{user_no}))
